job.title: Developer II - Software Engineering
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Role Proficiency<br><br></u></strong><strong>Job Description<br><br></strong>Acts under very minimal guidance to develop error free code; testing and documenting applications<br><br><strong><u>Outcomes<br></u></strong><ul><li> Understand the applications features and component design and develop the same in accordance with user stories/requirements.</li><li> Code debug test and document; and communicate product/component/feature development stages.</li><li> Develop optimized code with appropriate approach and algorithms following standards and security guidelines independently</li><li> Effectively interact with customers and articulate their input</li><li> Optimise efficiency cost and quality by identifying opportunities for automation/process improvements and agile delivery models</li><li> Mentor Developer I – Software Engineering to become more effective in their role</li><li> Learn technology business domain and system domain as recommended by the project/account</li><li> Set FAST goals and provide feedback to FAST goals of mentees<br></li></ul><strong><u>Measures Of Outcomes<br></u></strong><ul><li> Adherence to engineering processes and standards (coding standards)</li><li> Adherence to schedule / timelines</li><li> Adhere to SLAs where applicable</li><li> # of defects post delivery</li><li> # of non-compliance issues</li><li> Reduction of reoccurrence of known defects</li><li> Quickly turnaround production bugs</li><li> Meet the Defined productivity standards for project</li><li> Completion of applicable technical/domain certifications</li><li> Completion of all mandatory training requirements<br></li></ul><strong><u>Configure<br><br></u></strong>Outputs Expected:<br><ul><li>Follow configuration process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Test<br></u></strong><ul><li>Create and conduct unit testing<br></li></ul><strong><u>Domain Relevance<br></u></strong><ul><li>Develop features and components with good understanding of the business problem being addressed for the client<br></li></ul><strong><u>Manage Defects<br></u></strong><ul><li>Raise fix retest defects<br></li></ul><strong><u>Estimate<br></u></strong><ul><li>Estimate time effort and resource dependence for one's own work<br></li></ul><strong><u>Mentoring<br></u></strong><ul><li>Mentor junior developers in the team</li><li>Set FAST goals and provide feedback to FAST goals of mentees<br></li></ul><strong><u>Document<br></u></strong><ul><li>Create documentation for one's own work<br></li></ul><strong><u>Manage Knowledge<br></u></strong><ul><li>Consume and contribute to project related documents share point libraries and client universities <br></li></ul><strong><u>Status Reporting<br></u></strong><ul><li>Report status of tasks assigned</li><li>Comply with project related reporting standards/process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Release<br></u></strong><ul><li>Adhere to release management process<br></li></ul><strong><u>Design<br></u></strong><ul><li>Understand the design/LLD and link it to requirements/user stories <br></li></ul><strong><u>Code<br></u></strong><ul><li>Develop code with guidance for the above<br></li></ul><strong><u>Skill Examples<br></u></strong><ul><li> Explain and communicate the design / development to the customer</li><li> Perform and evaluate test results against product specifications</li><li> Develop user interfaces business software components and embedded software components</li><li> Manage and guarantee high levels of cohesion and quality</li><li> Use data models</li><li> Estimate effort time required for own work</li><li> Perform and evaluate tests in the customers or target environments</li><li> Team player</li><li> Good written and verbal communication abilities</li><li> Proactively ask for and offer help<br></li></ul><strong><u>Knowledge Examples<br><br></u></strong>Additional Comments:<br><br>None
